CHAT.comment: MOHAMMAD MUNAF, ET AL., Petitioners v. PETE GEREN, SECRETARY OF THE ARMY, ET AL.; and PETE GEREN, SECRETARY OF THE ARMY, ET AL., Petitioners v. SANDRA K. OMAR AND AHMED S. OMAR, AS NEXT FRIENDS OF SHAWQI AHMAD OMAR.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:14 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GREGORY G. GARRE ON BEHALF OF PETE GEREN, SECRETARY OF THE ARMY, ET AL.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOSEPH MARGULIES ON BEHALF OF MUNAF, ET AL. AND OMAR, ET AL.
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF GREGORY GARRE ON BEHALF OF PETE GEREN, SECRETARY OF THE ARMY, ET AL.
(Whereupon, at 11:23 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
